experience: You and Isaac both know 'Jayson Hoffer Financial Services and Retirement Planning, Mark Hayhurst, and 14 others

As part of the newly formed Dell Technologies (DT) Select Group representing all Dell Technology offerings (Dell, Dell EMC, Pivotal, RSA, SecureWorks, Virtustream, and VMware), responsible for internal business partnerships with field Sales Organization; and, coordinated partnership across the Strategically Aligned Businesses, Strategic Alliance Teams, and the Partner ecosystem to support enterprise transformation efforts to a team of dedicated client facing CTOs and Global Principal Architects.
Enterprise Architect, Americas Chief Technologist Team for Global Accounts

Due to the HP separation into Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) and HP, Inc., moved into the same role as part of the new HPE Americas Account Chief Technologist team for Global Accounts.Drove over $250MM in revenue for HPE by collaborating with clients in key global accounts through the conception, design and implementation of complex transformation topics including DevOps, Cloud, Big Data, Hybrid Infrastructure, Security, Digital Enterprise, Workplace Productivity, Mobility, and Internet of Things (IoT). Strategically managed activities across HPE and partners, weaving together services, software and hardware to deliver end-to-end solutions, formulating strategic direction, and devising business development initiatives.Responsible for developing the innovation agenda with client leadership in global accounts by influencing strategy based on analysis of their current and desired state to drive their strategic priorities.Responsible for providing broad business and technical thought leadership, business driven portfolio value management, roadmaps, and executive briefings with innovative and strategic ideas around business transformation and enterprise architecture.
Enterprise Architect, Americas Chief Technologist Team for Global Accounts

Drove over $250MM in revenue for HPE by collaborating with clients in key global accounts through the conception, design and implementation of complex transformation topics including DevOps, Cloud, Big Data, Hybrid Infrastructure, Security, Digital Enterprise, Workplace Productivity, Mobility, and Internet of Things (IoT). Strategically managed activities across HPE and partners, weaving together services, software and hardware to deliver end-to-end solutions, formulating strategic direction, and devising business development initiatives.Responsible for developing the innovation agenda with client leadership in global accounts by influencing strategy based on analysis of their current and desired state to drive their strategic priorities.Responsible for providing broad business and technical thought leadership, business driven portfolio value management, roadmaps, and executive briefings with innovative and strategic ideas around business transformation and enterprise architecture.
Enterprise Architect Team Lead: Americas Solution Architecture

Managed relationships with key enterprise, commercial, and government accounts, providing technical leadership and enterprise solution design. Excelled in absorbing an accurate picture of the client business, challenges, and needs.Created strategic relationships with business and technical leaders focusing on solutions and value propositions to maximize the client business goals and ongoing value.Translated client business requirements into specific solutions, then led technical architecture and design sessions with client architects providing architectural guidance and technical expertise.Delivered opportunistic engagements and business pursuit activities leveraging a broad range of enterprise IT solutions from HP along with joint alliance solutions from Microsoft and VMware.Played key technical advisor role in business pursuit activities for Business Intelligence (BI) and Data Warehouse (DW) opportunities with HP sales teams, hunter teams, and authorized HP Channel Partners focusing on solutions from HP, Microsoft, and Vertica. Responsible for mission critical presales providing customers with strategy briefings, requirements gathering, architectural design sessions, and proof of concepts to deliver successful solutions.Managed all presales resources and HP teams to provide project management and/or delivery of solutions as a means of reducing customer risk and closing deals.
Partner Presales Consultant: Americas Solution Architecture

Developed HP Channel Partners attain presales excellence (sales and technical) delivering the business value of HP business critical solutions becoming self-sufficient utilizing HP resources enabling successful customer engagements.Partnered with HP Channel Partners offering consulting services for customers, staff, and business development.Represented the HP Channel to the Global Business Units for new business opportunities and strategic directions.

summary: Distinguished technology leader with a demonstrated track record of delivering innovative business strategies and client-focused results in a diverse range of technologies and transformations. Partnering with business and IT leadership to develop the innovation agenda evolving people and process with emerging technologies, enterprise architecture, and services with technical account management in strategic mission-critical infrastructures for business and public safety environments. Skilled business technologist with knowledge of emerging technologies, best practices, and expertise to address current and future business needs.Business savvy professional with strong leadership skills and technical aptitude to leverage industry experience, cross functional / matrixed teams to take initiatives from conception to implementation.Expert and IT leader with proven track record at establishing and measuring IT performance relative to cost, value creation, and customer satisfaction, then optimizing productivity, quality, and customer service with solutions bridging the gap between technology and business goals.Forward thinker and communicator who is able to manage organizational ambiguity, complexity and change, while engendering loyalty, empowerment, building consensus and driving deliverables.Trusted Advisor to Fortune 50 accounts with annual technology spend in excess of $250MM, demonstrating thought leadership working closely with key stakeholders, clients (CxO & VP-level), business units, partners, developers, focus groups, and project managers on strategic roadmaps, emerging technology, and new business opportunities.Managed multi-million dollar programs and worldwide teams developing and leading transformational global IT initiatives across a diverse portfolio of business and technology requirements in global, enterprise, and public sector environments.
name: Isaac Blake
title: Chief Technologist, Global Principal Architect, Dell Technologies Select
